messages.title: CAMPAIGN TO SAVE SOLIHULL HOSPITAL
messages.content: Maggie is leading the campaign to save our hospital services under the threat of closure, co-ordinating thousands of residents for her petition, leading large, peaceful protests and lobbying the NHS Trust.

messages.title: A NEW DAY IN BRITAIN WITH A CAMERON GOVERNMENT
messages.content: The Conservatives are the only party with the ideas, the vision and the leadership to deliver the change Britain needs.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: To fight to protect our local services, whether it’s our NHS services, local post offices or our area’s schools.

issues.health: To fight to protect our local services, whether it’s our NHS services, local post offices or our area’s schools.

leaflet.personalStatement: Even before Maggie Throup was selected as our Parliamentary Candidate in July 2005, she was working hard for our community.

politicalExperience.achievements: Maggie has shown she never gives up, and gets results in her local campaigns. Her eight-year battle to stop the Maternity Service Station was successful, as was the fight to stop a second runway at Birmingham Airport.

contactInformation.website: Maggie's personal URL on her website details incurred as your Member of Parliament.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Maggie continues to lead the campaign to save our hospital services under the threat of closure, co-ordinating thousands of residents for her petition, leading large peaceful protests and lobbying the NHS Trust.
